wp:comment.wp:comment_content: My whole life I lived by the KISS (Keep It Simple, Stupid) but I never realized it had some basis in Einstein! Whoa! Still, when dealing with extreeme stress, or big jobs, it is important to remember to stick to the basics, ahev any extra steps that you can and cut out the grandious, in other words, keep it simple, and life is so much more pleasant.....I LOVE the quote from Dale Churchward...how I wish the more people could live by that motto...I want Tee shirts made of it I am so impressed!
